verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: pittsburgh] - [V: based] [ARG1: refugee agency] attributes program closure to trump policies one of pittsburgh refugee assistance programs is shutting down its services because of the dwindling number of refugees being resettled in the united states the sharpsburg - based northern area multi service center nams will close its community assistance and refugee resettlement program in january the program has been operating for seven years other nams community services will continue to operate after many successful years as a allegheny county pg publishing co twitter united states partner pennsylvania refugee resettlement program bhutan u s department of state allegheny county pennsylvania program children services kurt meier squirrel hill pittsburgh chief operating officer northern area multi service center united nations jewish family and community services refugee ajapo nams jfcs ashley murray
